fr.mentionHelp:
:wave: Bonjour !

:arrow_right: Suite √† un changement op√©r√© par Discord, vous devez utiliser des "commandes slash" pour interagir avec DraftBot. Utilisez le pr√©fixe `/` suivi du nom de la commande que vous souhaitez utiliser.

:thinking: Vous ne savez pas par o√π commencer ? √âcrivez `/help` !

:flag_gb: You speak english? Change the language with `{prefix}language`

Si vous avez besoin d'aide, n'h√©sitez pas √† rejoindre le serveur support: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
fr.dmHelpMessage:
<:draftbot:529305485963427840> **Quel est ce bot ? Comment jouer ?**

Une pr√©sentation rapide du bot est disponible ici : https://draftbot.com
Un guide complet pour d√©couvrir le bot est disponible ici : https://guide.draftbot.com

:inbox_tray: **Comment ajouter le bot √† mon serveur ?**
Le lien pour ajouter le bot sur votre serveur est disponible sur le serveur du bot. https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ

:skull: **Je viens de mourir, le bot m'a dit de faire la commande `respawn` **

Les commandes ne fonctionnent pas en message priv√©. Effectuez cette commande sur un serveur ou le bot peut parler.

:scroll: **Je cherche la liste des commandes.**

La liste des commande est disponible en effectuant la commande `help` dans un salon ou le bot peut parler.

:question: **J'ai une autre question.**

Rejoignez le serveur Discord du bot et posez votre question, notre staff sera ravi de vous aider !
https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
fr.dmHelpMessageTitle: {pseudo}, voil√† quelques informations qui pourraient vous aider.
fr.notInAGuild: Vous devez appartenir √† une guilde pour effectuer cette commande
fr.notAuthorizedError: Vous n'avez pas les permissions n√©cessaires pour effectuer cette commande au sein de votre guilde, demandez √† un de vos sup√©rieurs au besoin.

en.noSpeakPermission:
:zipper_mouth: | **Hello! You are receiving this message because you tried using one of my commands in a channel where I have the permissions to see messages but not send them!**

Your request was thus voided. To resolve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server you tried to use me in. If you can't resolve this problem, I invite you to read the bot's guide available here: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/ !
en.noReacPermission:
:x: | **Hello! You are receiving this message because you tried using one of my commands in a channel where I have the permissions to see messages but not react to them!**

Your request was thus voided. To resolve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server you tried to use me in. If you can't resolve this problem, I invite you to read the bot's guide available here: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/ !
en.noEmbedPermission:
:paperclip: | **Hello! You are receiving this message because you tried using one of my commands in a channel where I have the permissions to see messages but I can't embed links!**

Your request was thus voided. To resolve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server you tried to use me in. If you can't resolve this problem, I invite you to read the bot's guide available here: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/ !
en.noFilePermission:
:file_folder: | **Hello! You are receiving this message because you tried using one of my commands in a channel where I have the permissions to see messages but I can't attach files!**

Your request was thus voided. To resolve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server you tried to use me in. If you can't resolve this problem, I invite you to read the bot's guide available here: https://guide.draftbot.com/v/en/ !

en.mentionHelp:
:wave: Hello !

:arrow_right: Due to a change made by Discord, you must use "slash commands" to interact with DraftBot. Please use the prefix `/` followed by the name of the command you want to use.

:thinking: You do not know where to start ? Type `/help`!

:flag_fr: Vous parlez fran√ßais ? Changez la langue avec `{prefix}language`

If you need help, don't hesitate to join the support server: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
en.dmHelpMessage:
<:draftbot:529305485963427840> **What is this bot? How to play?**

A quick presentation is available here : https://draftbot.com
A complete guide to the bot is available here : https://guide.draftbot.com

:inbox_tray: **How to add the bot to my server?**
The link to add the bot is accessible on the bot's support sever. https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ

:skull: **I died. The bot told me to use the command `respawn` **

Commands aren't working in DMs. Please use this command on a server where the bot can speak.

:scroll: **I'm looking for the command list.**

The command list is available if you use `help` in a channel where the bot can speak.

:question: **I have something else on my mind.**

Please join the bot's Discord server and ask us, we will be happy to help!
https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
en.dmHelpMessageTitle: {pseudo}, here are some information that could help you.
en.notInAGuild: You have to be in a guild to use this command.
en.notAuthorizedError: You do not have the required permissions to do that command in your guild, please ask a superior if needed.

dm.titleSupport: {pseudo}, welcome to the DraftBot Assistance Program.
dm.messageSupport:
:flag_gb: If you want to receive help, select your language using reactions below. If you don't need help, please ignore this message.
:warning: **Every message sent here can be read by human!**

:flag_fr: Si vous avez besoin d'aide, s√©lectionnez votre langue en utilisant les r√©actions ci-dessous. Si vous n'avez pas besoin d'aide, ignorez ce message.
:warning: **Chaque message envoy√© ici peut √™tre lu par un humain !**

departurMessage:
:flag_fr:  Bonjour !

Vous recevez ce message car je ne peux pas rester sur votre serveur.

Malheureusement votre serveur ne remplit pas certaines des conditions d'utilisation du bot qui ont √©t√© mises en place pour maintenir un minimum de confort aux joueurs en garantissant des performances normales. Pour plus de d√©tails sur ces limitations, consultez https://draftbot.fandom.com/fr/wiki/Restrictions.

Si vous avez des questions sur le fonctionnement du bot ou si vous souhaiter contester ce d√©part je vous invite √† visiter le site internet : https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ o√π vous pourrez trouver un lien vers le discord de support du bot !

Cordialement - DraftBot


:flag_gb:  Hello!

You received this message because I can't stay on your server.

Unfortunately, your server doesn't fulfill some of the bot's requirements. These requirements are put in place to guarantee normal performance. For more details on these limitations, see https://draftbot.fandom.com/en/wiki/Restrictions

If you have questions about how the bot works, or if you want to discuss this, visit https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ where you can find a link to the bot‚Äôs support Discord!

Sincerely - DraftBot
